home.welcome_description: MNPLib is a comprehensive database of deep-sea natural products and their derivatives, funded by the National Key Research and Development Program of China, which provides integrated information on chemical structures, sources, bioactivities, NMR, and MS data.
home.title: Marine Compound Browser Website
home.description: Explore a comprehensive database of marine bioactive compounds with support for chemical structure queries, similarity searches, and substructure matching.
home.features_subtitle: Powerful cheminformatics tools and database functionality
home.feature1_description: Browse the complete marine compound database with support for category filtering and pagination.
home.feature2_description: Use the Ketcher chemical editor for exact structure matching, substructure search, and similarity search.
home.feature3_description: RDKit-based cheminformatics calculations supporting molecular fingerprints, similarity calculations, and substructure matching.

about.title: About MNPLib
about.subtitle: Exploring the Mission and Vision of Marine Natural Product Database
about.description: MNPLib is a comprehensive database of deep-sea natural products and their derivatives, funded by the National Key Research and Development Program of China, which provides integrated information on chemical structures, sources, bioactivities, NMR, and MS data.
about.mission_description: To provide researchers with high-quality, accessible marine natural product data to advance drug discovery and chemical biology research.
about.vision_description: To become the world's leading information resource platform for marine natural products, connecting chemistry, biology, and pharmacology research communities.
about.team_description: Our team consists of chemists, biologists, data scientists, and software engineers dedicated to providing the highest quality database services.
about.contact_description: If you have any questions, suggestions, or collaboration interests, please feel free to contact us.
